name: "Please control your soul's desire for freedom"
name_original: "Please control your soul's desire for freedom"
description:
Game description:

"From there, we sort of turn around and settle into this prisoner-like state of our lives, diving headfirst into our past." "Their courage, will, and endurance crumbles, and they believe they have fallen into a deep hole from which they will never be able to climb out."                                                                                                                                                                          ——Albert Camus (2013)La Peste  

"Please control your soul's desire for freedom" is a  short 2D narrative game that you can play in about 10 minutes. 

A sudden plague sweeps the world in 2052, and the main character Sanes' family becomes victims. Players have a limited amount of time to find items in a room to unlock the backstory and click on dialogue options to gain clues to the story. The game invites the player to think about what the real fears of the epidemic are and how Sanes will ultimately choose? Will she continue to 'live' or embrace a new world of uncertainty?

Control:

You can trigger game options and dialogue by clicking with the mouse.

Developer note:

This is the first game I have made. This game is available to play online(Full-screen mode is highly recommended) or to download for the best experience!

I used Adobe Illustrator to create the characters and scenes, and the dialogue and interaction in the game were done by Fungus and Unity.  The background music is Hon Hopkins' Monsters Theme. Sound effects were provided by https://www.aigei.com/. A small amount of the vector material comes from the Internet as well.

My Ins@wanxiao_christine. If you're interested in the game, feel free to contact me or leave a comment at the bottom of the page!
